snippet: Retail stocks were leading declines after less-than-stellar store sales on Thanksgiving and Black Friday.
abstract: Stocks fall modestly on weak holiday shopping reports.
lead_paragraph: Retail stocks were leading declines after less-than-stellar store sales on Thanksgiving and Black Friday.

headline.main: Wall St. Trading Is Tepid, Weighed Down by Retail
headline.print_headline: Retail Shares Dip on Weak Holiday Reports
